description:
Using basalt melted at super-high temperatures and spun into yarn, the GV80’s interior is unique and green. 

The post How Genesis uses volcanic rock and recycled newspapers in the GV80 SUV appeared first on Popular Science.
title: How Genesis uses volcanic rock and recycled newspapers in the GV80 SUV

description:
This article was originally featured on The Conversation. Recent reports that the H5N1 avian flu virus has been found in cow’s milk have raised questions about whether the U.S. milk supply is safe to drink. According to the federal Food and Drug Administration, the answer is yes, as long as the milk is pasteurized. Nonetheless, raw (unpasteurized) milk sales […]

The post Why you shouldn’t drink raw milk appeared first on Popular Science.
title: Why you shouldn’t drink raw milk
